content: 2 x 3 rib pattern round 7 sm k2 p1 p2tog k2 p2 3 times 8 times 128 sts unstretched round 9 sm k2 p2 3 times k2 p2tog 8 times 120 sts 28 sts and 44 rounds = 10 cm / 4 ins in 2 x 3 rib pattern round 11 sm k2 p2 twice k2 p2tog k2 p1 8 times 112 sts stretched until all stitches are visible round 13 sm k2 p2 k2 p2tog k2 p1 twice 8 times 104 sts 2 x 3 rib pattern round 15 sm k2 p2tog k2 p1 3 times 8 times 96 sts multiple of 5 sts round 17 sm k2 p1 3 times ssk p1 8 times 88 sts round 1 rs k2 p3 repeat to end round 19 sm k2 p1 twice ssk p1 k1 p1 8 times 80 sts repeat round to form pattern round 21 sm k2 p1 ssk p1 k1 p1 twice 8 times 72 sts round 23 sm ssk p1 k1 p1 3 times 8 times 64 sts abbreviations round 25 sm k1 p1 3 times ssk 8 times 56 sts approx approximately beg begin ning cm centimeter s round 27 sm k1 p1 twice ssk k1 8 times 48 sts in s inch es k knit m meter s mm millimeter s p purl round 29 sm k1 p1 ssk k2 8 times 40 sts pm place marker repeat repeat round round rm remove round 31 sm ssk k3 8 times 32 sts marker rs right side sm slip marker st s stitch es ws round 33 sm k2 ssk 8 times 24 sts wrong side yd yard s repeat inside instructions a round 35 rm ssk k1 8 times 16 sts specified number of times repeat inside instructions a cut yarn leaving approx 15 cm / 6 ins with yarn needle specified number of times thread strand through open stitches and draw up tight glossary fasten securely to ws p2tog purl 2 stitches together - right leaning decrease of 1 finishing stitch purl 2 stitches together as one sew in yarn ends gently steam or wet block crown area ssk slip slip knit - left leaning decrease of 1 stitch working taking care not to stretch out the ribbed brim one at a time slip next two stitches knitwise to right hand
